remarks: The irreducible elements of ` ZZ ` are exactly the prime numbers (and their negatives).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Dec-2014.) Obsolete version of ~ prmirred as of 10-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
prmirredOLD.1 $e |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) $.
prmirredOLD.2 $e |- I = ( Irred ` Z ) $.
prmirredOLD $p |- ( A e. I <-> ( A e. ZZ /\ ( abs ` A ) e. Prime ) ) $.
